commit message: Initial Commit. Created Android Studio Project
Added Analyzer Surface and Processing Loop.
Added Waterfall Plot
Added Scheduler and Filesource for testing
Added Grid and HackRF source
Optimized lifecycle and added setFreqency action
Redesigned drawing in surfaceview to support panning and zooming
Reverted drawing process to old style to gain performance. untested
UI performs better now. Implemented scrolling and zooming
frequency scale now adapts dynamically to the virtual sample rate. untested.
moved code from startReceiving() inside of startAnalyzer()
refactored logtag -> LOGTAG. AnalyzerSurface gets min and max freguency / sample rate directly from the source now.
Optimized grid. Added auto frame rate control. Fixed setters in hackrf source.
Added Settings, many bugfixes, autoscaling, ...
Added screen orientation setting and missing new files from last commit.
Added gain dialog for hackrf
Added file chooser for filesource setting
Added logging.
Optimized autoscale: ignore out-of-screen samples and the DC offset peak in the center
Replaced default app icon
Added Readme. Updated help link. Added binary apk
Added link to twitter in Readme.md
Combined start and stop buttons. Included latest hackrf_android lib version 1.07
Uploading latest binary (version 1.02)
Fixed min and max frequency in HackrfSource. Fixed bug in scrolling and scaling code.
Allow frequency input to be either in Hz or in MHz
Added setting for color map types. New color map types: JET, HOT, GQRX
Optimized color map type setter method
optimized drawing: only draw once per pixel!
Optimized processing loop by reusing buffer for the magnitude calculation
Provide UP navigation from the settings activity
Merge branch 'master' into optimize_drawing
Added fft drawing type setting (bars or line)
Uploading latest binary (version 1.03)
Adding AudioSink for manipulating the android audio subsystem
Adding FIR filter
FIR filter: Changed data type to double
Added Demodulator stub. Added capacity() to SamplePacket.
Set sample rate only in optimal steps. Auto follow when scrolling and zooming
Added peak hold and averaging
Uploading latest binary (version 1.04)
Included new features in Readme.md
merging master
Fixed bug: crash on double tap after app start. optimized auto-retuning

First working example of demodulation
Merge branch 'master' into demodulation
Make demodulation mode selectable in action bar
Added HalfBandLowPassFilter. Added channel selection to AnalyzerSurface. Optimized Demodulator.
Optimized doProcessing in AnalyzerProcessingLoop
Moved audio filtering into AudioSink. Added filterReal to FirFilter.
Put decimation process in seperate thread
Added squelch threshold testing
Adding nFM and AM demodulation
New launcher icon. Uploading latest binaries (version 1.06).
Bugfixes: log -> log10; demodulator state is now saved on orientation change.
Fixed squelch. Several minor bugfixes.
Added spectrum-waterfall ratio setting. changed text size.
Improving documentation. Adding missing comments
Added gain control to AM demodulation
Merge branch 'master' into demodulation

updated readme and changelog for new version

optimization: witched from doubles to floats.
included steps to create android studio project into readme
some optimization changes
Added hackrf amp and antenna power setting. Added decoupled axis setting. Gain dialog respects step size.

Adding RTL-SDR support. first running commit with many bugs!
RTL-SDR almost rewritten. Works better now, but still unstable
Bugfixes and optimization

work-around for lagging and crashing on frequency scrolls
adding options to enable/disable manual gain and AGC
fixed manual gain option
fixing rtlsdr gain setting on startup
improving decoupled scrolling. Set default mode to decoupled scrolling. Limit sample rate for rtl-sdr on source creation.
Hide rtlsdr gain settings if not adjustable. Work-around for rtl-sdr driver restart after orientation change. bugfixes in RtlsdrSource.

Don't set source to null after closing. Makes the app much more stable and thread safe.

Setting correct input type for edittext prefs in settings

Using anti-aliasing font on AnalyzerSurface

Only average the fft spectrum, not the waterfall plot

Hide lower/upper side band when set to USB/LSB
Setting Lollipop as target sdk. Uploading 1.10alpha binary.
Fixing complex FIR filter (fixes LSB and USB)
Updating hackrf_android to 1.09. Fixed bugs: Filesource EOF freeze; HackRF stayed in running mode after disconnect. Added checks for input values in preferences.
Extract raw IQ conversions in separate class. Added file format preference for file source
Auto-detecting file source settings from file name
increasing cosine length of mixer. Improving gain control for AM and SSB
